text:
Company: Garrett, Glenn and Larson

Senior Technical Sales/Optical Engineer

About Us:
Garrett, Glenn and Larson is a leading provider of cutting-edge optical solutions. Our team of experts is dedicated to delivering innovative products and exceptional customer service.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Technical Sales/Optical Engineer to join our dynamic sales team. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background in optics and exceptional sales skills. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building strong relationships with customers, and providing technical support to ensure customer satisfaction.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve revenue targets
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify new business opportunities
- Provide technical support to customers and internal stakeholders
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitor activity

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Optics, Physics, or a related field
- Minimum 5 years of experience in technical sales or a related field
- Strong understanding of optical principles and concepts
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Must have experience working in a corporate environment
- Ability to navigate social interactions with professionalism
- Near-native English skills are required; proficiency in Spanish is an asset

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
